quotes.quote: If every porkchop were perfect we wouldn't have hot dogs
quotes.author: Greg Universe

quotes.quote: Together we can change the world, just one random act of kindness at a time.
quotes.author: Ron Hall

quotes.quote: Change is the process by which the future invades our lives.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: All programmers are playwrights and all computers are lousy actors.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: You can’t use up creativity.  The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The most overlooked advantage to owning a computer is that if they foul up there's no law against wacking them around a little.
quotes.author: Joe Martin

quotes.quote: To err is human--and to blame it on a computer is even more so.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Nature does nothing uselessly.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not in civilization.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Art is born of the observation and investigation of nature.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Nature herself makes the wise man rich.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: I speak for the trees, for the trees have no tongues.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Live the life you've dreamed
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Art is born of the observation and investigation of nature.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The idea of a mass audience was really an invention of the Industrial Revolution.
quotes.author: David Cronenberg

quotes.quote: I merely took the energy it takes to pout and wrote some blues.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Art is making something out of nothing and selling it.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: It is when power is wedded to chronic fear that it becomes formidable.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Realism...has no more to do with reality than anything else.
quotes.author: Hob Broun

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Force is all-conquering, but its victories are short-lived.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Behave so the aroma of your actions may enhance the general sweetness of the atmosphere.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Forever is composed of nows.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Toil to make yourself remarkable by some talent or other.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: When one must, one can.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: All wealth is the product of labor
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: We boil at different degrees
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: We love even when our love is not requited.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: The reward of suffering is experience.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: When ambition ends, happiness begins.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A great artist is always before his time or behind it.
quotes.author: George Edward Moore

quotes.quote: When I have a terrible need of-shall I say the word-religion. Then i go out and paint the stars.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Always make the audience suffer as much as p ossible.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: You have to make it happen.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: A door is what a dog is perpetually on the wrong side of.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Form follows function
quotes.author: Louis Sullivan

quotes.quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: We cannot command Nature except by obeying her.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: A good picutre is equivalent to a good deed
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: I feel there is noting more truly artistic than to love people
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Creativity takes courage.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Great art picks up where nature ends.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: Those who do not want to imitate anything, produce nothing
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: A Good artist has less time than ideas
quotes.author: Martin Kippenberger

quotes.quote: If your experiment needs statistics, you ought to have done a better experiment.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: A physicist is an atom’s way of knowing about atoms.
quotes.author: George Wald

quotes.quote: An experiment is a question which science poses to Nature, and a measurement is the recording of Nature’s answer.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Falsity in intellectual action is intellectual immorality.
quotes.author: Thomas Chrowder Chamberlin

quotes.quote: Valid criticism does you a favor.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Science is the acceptance of what works and the rejection of what does not. That needs more courage than we might think.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him discover it in himself.
quotes.author: Galileo

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Equipped with his five senses, man explores the universe around him and calls the adventure Science.
quotes.author: Edwin Powell Hubble

quotes.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: We realize the importance of our voices only when we are silenced
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Don’t compromise yourself. You are all you’ve got. There is no yesterday, no tomorrow, it’s all the same day.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do you want to meet the love of your life? Look in the mirror.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: If you’re not making mistakes, then you’re not making decisions.
quotes.author: Catherine Cook

quotes.quote: Buckle up, and know that it’s going to be a tremendous amount of work, but embrace it.
quotes.author: Tory Burch

quotes.quote: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I’m not afraid of storms, for I’m learning to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Knowing what must be done does away with fear.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Done is better than perfect.
quotes.author: Shryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: A good compromise is one where everybody makes a contribution.
quotes.author: Angela Merkel

quotes.quote: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t live long enough to make them all yourself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A surplus of effort could overcome a deficit of confidence.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.quote: Social progress can be measured by the social position of the female sex
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: The writer must earn money in order to be able to live and to write, but he must by no means live and write for the purpose of making money
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: From each according to his abilities, to each accordign to his needs
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Something must be done to save humanity! A better world is possible!
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: Leadership is about vision and responsibility, not power.
quotes.author: Seth Berkley

quotes.quote: It makes a lot more sense for us to be investing in jobs and education rather than jails and incarceration
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: If a financial institution is too big to fail, it is too big to exist
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates
